setProperties

void setProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
Set any factory specific properties. The properties can also be set in the esl4j.properties file. Below is an example on how to set the properties in the config file: 
   org.kamranzafar.esl4j.LogFactory=myapp.MyLogFactory
   myapp.MyLogFactory.property1=value1
   myapp.MyLogFactory.property2=value2

Parameters:
props -
